data.text: Then I saw in the right hand of him who sits on the throne a scroll written on the inside and 5:1 outside 80.2% ¦ on the back CT TR 8.9%outside, sealed with seven seals.
And I saw a mighty angel proclaiming with a loud voice, “Who is worthy to open the scroll and break its seals?”
But no one in heaven 5:3 above ¦ --- ANT BYZ CT PCK TRabove or on earth or under the earth could open the scroll or look into it.
So I began to weep loudly because no one was found who was worthy to 5:4 open ¦ open and read PCK TRopen the scroll or look into it.

Then one of the elders said to me, “Do not weep; behold, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has 5:5 conquered; he is the one who can 41.7% ¦ conquered so as to Αν ANT BYZ CT PCK TR 53.5%conquered; he is the one who can open the scroll 5:5 and ¦ and break TRand its seven seals.”

Then I 5:6 saw ¦ looked, and behold, there was TRsaw a Lamb that looked like it had been slain; he was standing among the elders in the midst of the throne and the four living creatures. He had seven horns and seven eyes, which are the seven spirits of God sent out into all the earth.
He went and took the scroll out of the right hand of him who was sitting on the throne.
When he took the scroll, the four living creatures and the twenty-four elders fell down before the Lamb. Each of them had a harp and golden bowls full of incense, which are the prayers of the saints.
And they sang a new song:
